Package deusto.safebox.common.util

Class JsonConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • deusto.safebox.common.util.JsonConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigFile
    public class JsonConfig
extends Object
implements ConfigFile
    JSON formatted config file.

    The path used in some of the methods is a string of keys separated by a period.

    For example, the path to access the street attribute in this JSON object is address.street 

     {
  name: "John",
  age: 31,
  address: {
      street: "Sesame Street"
  }
 }

      • objectAtPath

        private com.google.gson.JsonObject objectAtPath​(String path)

      • ofResource

        public static JsonConfig ofResource​(String resourcePath,
                                    Path extract)
                             throws IOException
        Creates a JsonConfig from a JSON file in the system disk. If the file doesn't exist in the system disk, then the resource file in resourcePath is first extracted to extractionPath and then read.
        Parameters:
        resourcePath - file path to the JSON file in the application resources.
        extract - file path where to read or extract the file.
        Returns:
        the loaded JSON config file.
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error reading or extracting the file.
